body.name: Roe & Moe Egg Cooker - Non-Stick, Ceramic Microwave Egg Poacher with Dome Chimney Lid and Hollow Handle - Reimagine Breakfast with Picture-Perfect Eggs and Delicious Soups with Our Microwave Steamer
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 38 mins
features: ✓ REDEFINE YOUR CULINARY JOURNEY - Have you ever imagined how a single kitchen gadget could transform your whole culinary experience? Meet your new companion, the Roe & Moe ceramic microwave egg boiler, your passport to quick, perfectly portioned, delicious meals. Our 12 ounce non-stick egg maker is perfect for single-serve soups, eggs, pies, and even vegetables. So, whether you're focusing on portion control, or simply want to whip up a quick, nutritious meal, our egg steamer has you covered.

✓ GUILT-FREE GOURMET DELIGHTS - Eager to ditch unhealthy cooking habits and embrace a healthier lifestyle without compromising taste? The non-stick surface of our microwave egg cooker allows you to prepare dishes without butter, fats, or oils. This, combined with your microwave's power, allows you to create healthy meals in a snap from fluffy scrambled eggs to guilt-free yummy desserts. Plus, our hard boiled egg cooker is easy to clean, saving you time for the things that truly matter.

✓ CONSISTENT HEAT, PERFECT TO EAT - Equipped with a dome-shaped chimney lid and hollow handle, this boiled egg cooker is designed to circulate heat evenly, ensuring your food is cooked to perfection every time. The chimney allows steam to escape, preventing the microwave steamer from exploding, making it a reliable option for all your cooking needs. Perfectly cooked eggs and delightfully baked apple pies from the breakfast maker are now just a microwave beep away.

✓ SAFETY MEETS CONVENIENCE - Have you ever touched a hot pot straight out of the microwave with bare hands? Our innovative poached egg maker features a hollow handle that is heat resistant and stays cool to the touch, ensuring your safety even straight out of the microwave. No need for oven mitts or waiting for our egg poacher microwave to cool down. This thoughtful design makes our dash egg maker safe and convenient for anyone in the family to use, from parents to young chefs.

✓ CUSTOMER SATISFACTION IS OUR PRIORITY - Please feel free to contact us if you have any queries about our ceramic dash egg cooker. At Roe & Moe, we offer immediate support to provide our Stove Top Stars with a risk free and seamless experience.
body.description: Step into a World of quick, delicious, and healthy morning treats. Unleash your inner chef with our hardboiled egg maker designed specifically for creating quick, and perfectly portioned meals. Whether you're living alone, focusing on portion control, or simply want a quick meal, our egg microwave cooker has you covered. Perfect egg boiler for hard-boiled eggs. Specifically designed egg poacher cookware. Experience effortless poaching with our easy egg poacher. Compact but mighty, meet our mini egg cooker. Ideal poached egg maker for microwave use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and East
reviews.reviewText: Works just as described. Produces a great egg breakfast in minutes. If you don’t like wasting time and cleaning a frying pan you are going to love this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use it every morning
reviews.reviewText: I make shakshuka in it every morning before work. I love shakshuka, but it's too involved to make it when I'm short on time, and makes too many dishes.Not anymore! I use this pot, Mina Shakshuka sauce, and one egg. I microwave it for 2 minutes, add some feta cheese on top, and do it for another 30 seconds. It's amazing.The handle is hollow, so it doesn't get hot (at least with the amount of time I microwave it for), but the lid does get pretty hot, so you'll need a towel or pot holder to remove it.It's also super convenient that I can eat straight out of the pot. When I'm done I put it in the sink and fill it with water (so the stuff doesn't get crusty), and it's very easy to wash when I get home from work, because it doesn't stick.I could not be more pleased. I dislike the taste of eggs by themselves, but sweet breakfasts give me a sugar crash, so I hadn't been eating breakfast for a while. It seems like I'm over stating it, but this lil pot made breakfast possible for me again.100% recommend. I need to try mug cake in it next...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little ceramic dish for quick microwave egg, etc.
reviews.reviewText: This is a SMALL but well made ceramic dish that does a great job of cooking an egg or two in the microwave. I inadvertently ordered two and use them. Just be careful as the lid is very hot when you remove it. Also the handle on the dish may be a bit short for some people..just use caution. Overall, very nice purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars does the job
reviews.reviewText: A little heavy - cover should fit more firmly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saved me from eggsplosions.
reviews.reviewText: I thought it's one of these useless husband purchases but it's actually very convenient. I use it mostly to make scrambled eggs for my toddler. They come out super fluffy and if you tip the eggs out onto a plate it looks like a cute little egg cake. It's easy to clean and doesn't stick. Dishwasher safe. And it also saved me from exploding eggs..the heavy lid stays on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Roe and Moe egg cooker.
reviews.reviewText: It's great for making a quick and easy omelet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Makes great apple pies and omelets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A very small pamphlet was included. It has six recipes, but no basic instructions for poached eggs or omelets, which were mentioned in the ad. I was especially looking for an easy way to make a poached egg. If it is possible to do so in this cooker, I wish the instructions had been included.
